title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
description: Improved the performance of machine learning models on a dataset of 284,807 transactions by implementing advanced sampling techniques. Achieved an impressive 93% accuracy using Decision Tree, AdaBoost, and Random Forest classifiers. Conducted thorough error analysis through confusion matrices and cross-validation to ensure high data quality and model reliability.

title: Insurance Cost Analysis
description: Optimized machine learning model performance by transforming and encoding categorical data from a dataset of 1,338 patient records. Developed a Linear Regression model that accurately estimated individual medical costs, achieving a low prediction error of just 0.18.
